mapper.insert: insert into canidae (id, user_id, name, birth, breed, profile_image_url, profile_image_alt, gender, weight, is_primary) values ( #{id}, #{userId}, #{name}, #{birth}, #{breed}, #{profileImageUrl}, #{profileImageAlt}, #{gender}, #{weight}, #{isPrimary} )
mapper.select: select count(*) from canidae where user_id = #{userId}
